title: Unique small R
content:
[http://s27.postimg.org/oyej4b09d/font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415094034/http:/s27.postimg.org/oyej4b09d/font.jpg "http://s27.postimg.org/oyej4b09d/font.jpg")

look at a small R letter - it is unique!
author: srodas

comments.content: no, take a closer look at small r!

Second the ID—definitely Ubuntu, which is available as a free Google web font:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ubuntu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415094034/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ubuntu "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ubuntu")
